attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think its about time Gordon Brown reviewed the tax on fuel and for him to step in to stop the fuel companies from ripping the British people off.Its time we downed tools and stopped using fuel until they see sence the fuel is far to dear nad will bring this country to its knees, its about time we stood together  and said no to the fuel prices

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
